roleset.name: begin
roleset.note: INITIATE-V NOTES: Actually, this whole frameset was created by copying 'start' and replacing all the 'start's with 'initiate's. The examples are a little funky.Member of Vncls establish-55.5-1. (from initiate.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Mr. Bush said that he initiated talks with the Soviets on the informal meeting by sending a proposal to Mr. Gorbachev last July , which the Soviet leader readily accepted .
example.arg: talks with the Soviets on the informal meeting
by sending a proposal to Mr. Gorbachev last July , which the Soviet leader readily accepted

example.name: instrumental object
example.text: The book initiated with a murder

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0
example.text: President Chen Shui - bian personally attended the anniversary event , and vowed to carry on the policy , initiated by the previous government , of apologizing to and caring for the victims .
Ben's initiation of the speech with a joke went over well with the audience.

roleset.name: perform welcoming ritual
roleset.note: INITIATE-V NOTES: I haven't actually seen any of these yet; if you find a real examplesend it to me so I can include it in the frames. (from initiate.02-v)

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: a rite of passage that initiated him into the world of Adirondack guides and mountaineers
example.arg: the world of Adirondack guides and mountaineers

roleset.name: personal quality/manner of doing something without prompting
roleset.note: INITIATIVE-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

example.name: initiative-n
example.text: I congratulate Senator Fielding on his initiative in driving the Senate Inquiry into the Wind.
example.arg: in driving the Senate Inquiry into the Wind
